alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:55AM CDT until June 15 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1254 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, or 12 miles southwest of Kearney, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kearney around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gibbon and Shelton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 292. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
